sentence: The GOP leader's decision to wade into the primary battle and support the Trump-endorsed Harriet Hageman marks a departure from the status quo of top party leaders protecting their incumbents.
title: McCarthy picks his path on Cheney: Try to boot her from Congress

sentence: (CNN)House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy has endorsed Harriet Hageman, the Trump-backed opponent of incumbent Rep. Liz Cheney of Wyoming -- a rare endorsement from leadership in a divisive GOP primary, and one that marks the culmination of a simmering feud between the two powerful Republicans battling over the future of their party.
author: Ryan Nobles, Manu Raju and Melanie Zanona
title: McCarthy endorses Cheney foe in Wyoming GOP primary

sentence: The GOP leader's decision to wade into the primary battle and support the Trump-endorsed Harriet Hageman marks a departure from the status quo of top party leaders protecting their incumbents.
